content: Department of Biology | Eberly College of Science Skip to main content The Eberly College of Science Department of Biology Explore Our Undergraduate Program Undergraduate Program With a program that lets you explore your scientific interests, gain real-world experience, and make valuable connections with faculty experts, you’ll turn your passion for science into the start of a fulfilling career. Explore Our Graduate Program Graduate Program Excel in your research, elevate your scientific prowess, and make contributions that enhance the world at large. Learn more about our Research Research Internationally recognized. Internally driven. In seven different buildings throughout campus—and all over the globe—you’ll find a diverse community of biologists who are committed to improving our society. We’re widely recognized for our excellence in teaching and research in a wide array of subjects, from tiny molecules to immense ecosystems. On Penn State’s campus, we’re known for our integration with other subjects as well. Department of Biology Our faculty members are more than professors—they’re mentors, researchers, and experts in the field of biology.
